    • Uses of Coupon in dao.db

      Methods in dao.db that return Coupon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Coupon CouponDaoDb.getCoupon(long id)
      user can get a coupon by giving the id ( no user will give id in the system it will happened automatically in the facade (after logging in ).
      Methods in dao.db that return types with arguments of type Coupon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CouponDaoDb.getAllCoupon()
      this method get all the coupons from the DB and returns them as a collection
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CouponDaoDb.getCouponByType(CouponType couponType)
      This method gets a "coupontype" variable from the user, and get all the coupons from the DB with the same type as chosen by the user, and returns them as a collection
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CustomerDaoDb.getCoupons(long customerId)
      this method give the user all the coupons in the system .
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyDaoDb.getCoupons(long companyId)
      this method will give the user HashSet with all the company coupons .
      Methods in dao.db with parameters of type Coupon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CouponDaoDb.create(Coupon coupon)
      every coupon get a unique id from the sql table in the database the generated key(id) will be embedded in the coupon.

      method to remove a coupon.

      This method get all the coupons, and by "type" variable from the user, it's make a filtering.

      user can get all the coupon that he or she bought with lower or equal to the price he gave .

      Methods in facade with parameters of type Coupon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CompanyFacade.createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      we are checking that the coupon title is unique before we let the company create the coupon.
      void CustomerFacade.purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      a customer can purchase coupon after the checking that the customer didn't bought this coupon all-ready and if there coupons left and that the date isn't expired; the method will decrease the amount of coupon from the company balance after the customer purchase one
      void CompanyFacade.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      When a coupon is being removed its removed from the customers purchased coupons and from the table of the company coupons
      void CompanyFacade.updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      a company can only update the expiration date and the price of the coupon.

    • Uses of Coupon in webServices

      Methods in webServices with parameters of type Coupon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> CompanyWebService.createCoupon(Coupon coupon, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Method handling HTTP POST requests, This method is used to get a request with coupon object from the client over HTTP protocol, apply the method "createCoupon", and sends a response's entity inside the body, over HTTP protocol.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> CustomerWebService.PurchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Method handling HTTP POST requests, This method is used to get a request with a coupon object from the client over HTTP protocol, apply the method "purchaseCoupon", and sends a response's entity inside the body, over HTTP protocol.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> CompanyWebService.updateCoupon(Coupon coupon, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Method handling HTTP PUT requests, This method is used to get a request with coupon object from the client over HTTP protocol, apply the method "updateCoupon" and sends a response's entity inside the body, over HTTP protocol.
